title: Issue with club tag displaying.
body:
Hey guys,

My club's tag doesn't appear next to my name anywhere even though it is set as my active club and the club has over the minimum required number of players in it. In fact, all the other players in the club have it show up next to their names. Any clarification on why this might be happening?

Cheers.

replies.body:
Hey,

I did eventually find a solution. You just have to leave the club and have someone invite you back in.

Hopefully it works for you too.
